alert.note: Alert for Bayamon; Carolina; Catano; Dorado; Guaynabo; San Juan; Toa Alta; Toa Baja (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 18 at 2:50PM ADT until September 18 at 7:15PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Bayamon County in Puerto Rico... Carolina County in Puerto Rico... Catano County in Puerto Rico... Dorado County in Puerto Rico... Guaynabo County in Puerto Rico... San Juan County in Puerto Rico... Toa Alta County in Puerto Rico... Toa Baja County in Puerto Rico... * Until 615 PM AST. * At 150 PM AST, Doppler radar and USGS sensors indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 5 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms with heavy rains. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of rivers, small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Mudslides and rockfall will be likely in areas of steep terrain. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... San Juan, Guaynabo, Bayamon, Catano, Sabana Seca, Toa Alta, Trujillo Alto, Toa Baja, Carolina, Dorado, Corozal, Vega Alta, Levittown, Candelaria, Pajaros, Candelaria Arenas, Ingenio, Campanilla, San Jose and Galateo. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Bayamon; Carolina; Catano; Dorado; Guaynabo; San Juan; Toa Alta; Toa Baja
